title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
NOTE: On the AP Exam, to earn a point for a rubric row, responses will need to meet all criteria for that row.

Points earned:

+1 [Skill 3.A] The video demonstrates the running of the program, including input.

Do NOT award a point if:

● the video does not show a demonstration of the program running (screenshots or storyboards are not acceptable and would not be credited.)

+1 [Skill 3.A] The video demonstrates the running of the program, including output.

Do NOT award a point if:

● the video does not show a demonstration of the program running (screenshots or storyboards are not acceptable and would not be credited.)

+1 [Skill 3.A] The response identifies the input and output of the program demonstrated in the video.

+1 [Skill 3.A] The response describes how the input affects the functionality of the program.
descriptions:
